title: 03 Future Food: Green is the New Black
description: Sam Kass, former White House chef for the Obama Family joins host Paul to continue our conversation on "future food." As a venture capitalist and the Founder of Trove Worldwide, Sam talks to Paul about how food companies are responding to not only food trends, but also environmental trends.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
